DOC.brief_summary: Comparison different inositol stereoisomears prevent adverse obstetric outcome non-obese pregnant woman high risk gestational diabetes mellitus .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator compare outcomes metabolic obstetric point view GDM pregnant non-obese patient different stereoisomears inositol supply . Dietary control placebo inositol steroisomears administer start enrol time ( first fast oral glucose 92 mg % ; usually 20 week gestation ' ) till delivery and/or pregnancy end/termination . Oral glucose tolerance test result 24-28 week ' gestation evaluate ( glucose value oGTT screen ) . Fetal growth , delivery data , obstetric outcome necessity insulin therapy take account .
